title: Models of European metro stations
author: tcumulus
aiHeadline: Discover the painstakingly detailed models of European metro stations, because clearly, we don't have enough trains in real life.

title: ChatControl update: blocking minority held but Denmark is moving forward anyway
author: nickslaughter02
aiHeadline: ChatControl update: minority opinions are inconvenient, but Denmark is charging forward anyway, proving that sometimes you just need to ignore the naysayers and do your thing.

title: EPA Seeks to Eliminate Critical PFAS Drinking Water Protections
author: enraged_camel
aiHeadline: EPA decides that protecting drinking water from toxic chemicals is overrated, because nothing says 'we care about you' like exposing millions to 'forever chemicals.'

title: Repetitive negative thinking associated with cognitive decline in older adults
author: redbell
aiHeadline: New study finds that overthinking is bad for your brain, which is why you should probably stop reading this and go do something productive instead.

title: Writing an operating system kernel from scratch
author: Bogdanp
aiHeadline: Writing an operating system kernel from scratch: because who needs sleep when you can spend weeks debugging a boot loader? (Hint: nobody.)
